CustomField.formula: VALUE( TAT_Hours__c )*60 - if(Text(Status__c) ='Closed', (Closed_Date_Time__c - Date_Time_Reported__c)*24*60 - On_Hold_Hours__c, (NOW()- Date_Time_Reported__c)*24*60 - On_Hold_Hours__c - if(Text(Status__c) ='On Hold' , (NOW()- DateTimeCalculation__c)*24*60 - On_Hold_Hours__c,0))
CustomField.label: TAT Remaining
